Items.Title: Beginning
Items.Info:
Hello! Welcome to <color=green>the game</color> where you can learn the basics of programming in one of the most popular languages.
 You have to solve problems by writing code to help the main character - the Robot  - overcome obstacles in his path and continue his story.
 Now let's tell you a little more.

Items.Title: Instruction. Task
Items.Info: During the task, you can see its description in the upper left corner. In addition, by clicking on the gray button in the corner, you can again get additional information that appears before the task.

Items.Title: Instruction. Pad
Items.Info: We need some kind of tool for programming, so a multifunctional pad is available to you. To turn it on, just click on it.

Items.Title: Start
Items.Info:
Hi player! Welcome to <color=green>Coding Learn</color>, a game where you can learn the basics of programming in <color=green>C#</color>, one of the most popular languages. 
 You have to solve problems by writing code to help the main character - <color=green>assistant robot</color> - overcome obstacles in his path and continue his story.
 Now let's talk a little more.

Items.Title: Training Quest
Items.Info: During the execution of the task, you can see its description in the <color=green>upper left corner</color>. In addition, by clicking on the <color=green>gray button</color> in the corner, you can again get additional information that appears before the task.

Items.Title: Learning. Tablet
Items.Info: We need a tool for programming, so a multifunctional <color=green>tablet</color> is available to you. To turn it on, just <color=green>click on it</color>.

Items.Title: Learning. Writing Code
Items.Info: Most of the tablet screen is occupied by the code field, where the most important thing happens - <color=green>programming</color>.

Items.Title: Learning. Code Reset
Items.Info: If it suddenly seems to you that the solution to the problem has gone somewhere wrong, you can quickly return to the initial code using the <color=green>Reset code</color> button.

Items.Title: Tutorial. Hints
Items.Info: In case you don't understand how to solve a problem, you can get a <color=green>hint</color>. Each hint becomes available after a few minutes, so it's best to try to solve the problem yourself. Plus, it's easy more interesting!)

Items.Title: Learning Handbook
Items.Info: While solving problems, you will learn a lot about the programming language. In order not to forget anything, you can read a special <color=green>reference</color>, which collects everything that you have learned before.

Items.Title: Training. Tests
Items.Info: To make the tasks more interesting, <color=green>challenge</color> is available for each of them. For completing each one you will get <color=green>stars</color>. Try to get them all!

Items.Title: Training. Mistakes
Items.Info: If you happen to make a <color=green>error</color> in your code, the IDE will let you know by displaying a <color=green>message</color> at the bottom of the screen.

Items.Title: Tutorial. Minimizing tablet
Items.Info: The button in the <color=green>upper right corner</color> of the tablet minimizes it. This way you can see the location during the mission, which can be sometimes useful - hints can be <color=green>everywhere</color >!

Items.Title: First task
Items.Info: Well, now it's time to program! We have prepared the first task for you, but don't be afraid - it is, of course, very simple.
